title: Diane!
description: Host Diane Simmons speaks with guests to air dirty secrets and mend relationships.
quote: Actually, I’m not really a horse. I’m a broom.
altHero: Diane Simmons in front of her audience
alt1: a woman and man sit on chairs and talk
alt2: the man is a broom in jeans
alt3: Diane in front of the Griffin family
alt4: Chris Griffin throwing Lois and her armchair across the stage
